Openlabs.Mgcxm.Net.HttpUseAuthorizationAttribute Class Reference Openlabs.Mgcxm.Net.HttpUseAuthorizationAttribute
Represents an attribute used to specify the authorization scheme required for an HTTP endpoint method.

Detailed Description
Represents an attribute used to specify the authorization scheme required for an HTTP endpoint method.
